summary: 2014 DODGE DART DIDN'T WANT TO START, PUT IT IN N AND WAITED A FEW MINS AND IT STARTED. NEXT MORNING SAME ISSUE, BUT WOULDN'T START IN N. JUMPED THE CAR , DROVE IT 50 MILES BUT DIDN'T SHUT IT OFF.. GOT HOME SHUT IT OFF, WOULDN'T START IMMEDIATELY AFTER TURNING IT OFF. TODAY JUMPED IT TO TAKE IT TO GET OB2 READER TO GET CODES SINCE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON.. CARS ABS LIGHT IS ON, THROTTLE CONTROL LIGHT, CHECK ENGINE. AMEN WINDSHELD WIPERS WERE ON WITH WIPERS IN OFF POSITION. CAR HAS NO POWER WHEN PUTTING IN DRIVE NOW.. ALMOST SEEMS LIKE IT DIDN'T KNOW IT WAS IN DRIVE. I LOOKED UP ISSUES WITH THIS MODEL, EVERYTHING IS POINTING TO THE TCM AND BCM
